about_the_game:
“Chronicles” are packs of themed levels with a self-contained story told throughout, and are unlocked after completing the first 6 levels of the main campaign.

Deep within the dense jungle lands of the Outlands, a girl is born. As she grows up in a world of power-hungry leaders and reckless habits, she will learn valuable lessons about the intricate cycle of life and nature, the cost of unrestrained ambition, and, most importantly, herself.

“Life of Yolotli” is the third DLC for Outlanders, in which we follow the life of one single leader in different stages of her life, from her curious childhood all the way to her enlightened elder years.

In addition to the 6-level campaign, this DLC contains new customization options for Sandbox mode.
detailed_description:

Deep within the dense jungle lands of the Outlands, a girl is born. As she grows up in a world of power-hungry leaders and reckless habits, she will learn valuable lessons about the intricate cycle of life and nature, the cost of unrestrained ambition, and, most importantly, herself.

“Life of Yolotli” is the third DLC for Outlanders, in which we follow the life of one single leader in different stages of her life, from her curious childhood all the way to her enlightened elder years.

In addition to the 6-level campaign, this DLC contains new customization options for Sandbox mode.
name: Outlanders - Life of Yolotli

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3 4170
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Deep within the dense jungle lands of the Outlands, a girl is born. As she grows up in a world of power-hungry leaders and reckless habits, she will learn valuable lessons about the intricate cycle of life and nature, the cost of unrestrained ambition, and, most importantly, herself.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
